author: stoddard
msg: Fix a couple of logic bugs:
1. The previous code was missing the last sleep cycle, thus we would wait only half
the time we should have been waiting.
2. We were incorrectly setting the need_timeout flag if pc->kill_how was not

author: jorton
msg: Fix build on BSD/OS 4.0, where sys/sysctl.h needs other headers to be
included first; only include this header on FreeBSD, since it's only
used on FreeBSD by the include_hdrs_in_length() function.

author: stoddard
msg: Update free_proc_chain timeout algorithm from a static 3 second timeout

author: brane
msg: implementations for Unix and Win32, needed by apr_xlate.
